Video Hero

released

Single Video Reference default 16:9

Advanced Microservices Tracing with Jaeger

One of the greatest challenges of moving from traditional monolithic application design to a microservices architecture is being able to monitor your business transaction flow—the flow of events via micro service calls throughout your entire system. Business transaction flow—the flow of events via micro service calls throughout your entire system.

Burr Sutter
Chief Developer Evangelist
